title: My knee.. Ouch.. :(
content:
I hurt my right knee today. You know those cars that have the front seats that must be pulled down so that one can get out from the backseat? I was in one of those, on the backseat, and when got out there I tripped over and fell right on my knees on hard asphalt from the car. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-sad.gif[/img] My right knee hurts so much.. It's hard to walk, sit, and don't know how I should keep the leg. Naturally I don't want to take 'painkillers'..
GAAARG! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-garg.gif[/img] I hate tripping over. Glad there were no other cars that could've driven over me when I was on the street. I should be more careful perhaps.
Oh, and strangely the left knee isn't hurting at all. Perhaps the right one hit the ground earlier and caused the other not to impact the ground so much. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-rolleyes.gif[/img] Be careful when getting out of cars![url=http://www.keengrid.net/]keengrid.net[/url]

title: Re: My knee.. Ouch.. :(
content:
Pain, in general, sucks.
Get well soon!Retodon8

title: Gaaaaaaaarg!!!
content:
Geese; I once was running through the house, I was going down the steps, and tripped over our phone line at the top of the stairs. I went at a perfect diagonal, and didn't hurt anything till my knees hit the bottom. I almost broke them. I was in bed for a few days.

I also broke my left arm (I write with my right, and throw with my left [I am weird]); I was riding down the hill. My left hane is my stronger hand. I thus squeezed the front brake hard, and was flipped off my bike. I slammed the ground, and my flipping bike nailed me in the arm!!!

Pain stinks, but It's part of life, and thus, we must live with it.

Darn it though.

-- NAJAWA --

content:

I thus squeezed the front brake hard, and was flipped off my bike. I slammed the ground, and my flipping bike nailed me in the arm!!![hr][/quote]

OWCH!!! Owch!!! Owch...[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-deadkeenvort.gif[/img]

Pain stinks. Darn it, pain can kill!!!! (Yes, I'm alive, otherwise I'd be an zombie) But we have to live with it. But darn that darned pain anyways, it stinks.[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-dead.gif[/img]

KR, just pop a couple motrin every 8 hours, that does the trick for me.[url=http://spatang.com/ck][img]http://spatang.com/ck/bannersm.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://spatang.com/cosmo][img]http://spatang.com/cosmo/bannersm.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://spatang.com/nukem][img]http://www.spatang.com/nukem/bannersm.jpg[/img][/url] [img]http://spatang.com/scrobblersig.php[/img]

title: Re: Shot!!!
content: I got lost in a parking garage looking for my car and walked in on some sort of big drug deal.  I went up to them to ask a question and the guy grabbed a gun and shot at me, one bullet grazed my neck, the other hit it.  Luckily I was already tackling him at that point (the other guy ran away).  His head slammed against the concrete and he got knocked out.  I called 911 and they fixed me up and arrested him.[url=http://spatang.com/ck][img]http://spatang.com/ck/bannersm.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://spatang.com/cosmo][img]http://spatang.com/cosmo/bannersm.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://spatang.com/nukem][img]http://www.spatang.com/nukem/bannersm.jpg[/img][/url] [img]http://spatang.com/scrobblersig.php[/img]

title: Re: My knee.. Ouch.. :(
content:
[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-pogo.gif[/img]

Once I was training for the Boston marathon and I fell on a treadmill with a really bad safety mechanism that I couldn't reach once I was on my knees and now I have a quarter size scar on my left knee, which is mistaken by some as a weird divot where I might've kneeled on a stone. You know.

Not as amazing as xtraverse's tale but I felt the need to contribute.------
Fanya - Agility Hybrid Knight - Ragnarok Online - Chaos Server - 80/50 - Retired

~Currently playing FFI, Castlevania: SotN, Gunbound~
